attributes.action: Freedom to travel abroad with or without Covid vaccine.
attributes.additional_details:
Because forcing this segregates individuals which is a form of bullying.  We should be allowed to make choices for our own health and our own bodies.  It is our human right for our own mental well-being.

Thanks for listening.
attributes.background: To allow individuals to travel abroad and be an active part of society without having a feeling of being forced to have COVID vaccination.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions on allowing people to enter a country are a matter for the Government of those countries, not the UK Government or Parliament (other than for entry into the UK).

You might like to sign these petitions

Do not rollout Covid-19 vaccine passports: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569957

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
